short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to organize your tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Wrangler organizes your Chrome tabs and allows you to navigate more effectively while enhancing productivity and decluttering your browsing experience. Create tab groups, arrange tabs by domain or subject, consolidate windows, and generate lists of open tabs in various formats. Features include keyword filtering, removing inactive or duplicate tabs, and a dynamic Tab Navigator for quick access. Designed for ease of use, it offers a streamlined way to manage your digital workspace. Perfect for those looking to keep their browser organized and efficient.  

Tab Wrangler is ideal for researchers, students, professionals, and anyone juggling multiple projects or interests online. By organizing tabs into manageable groups and providing tools to quickly access or clear unnecessary tabs, it helps users stay focused and efficient. Whether consolidating research, separating work from personal browsing, or saving important tabs for later, Tab Wrangler enhances your ability to navigate and control your digital environment, making it an essential tool!

All this is for free with no catch or data collection!

Instructions are provided within the extension. Simply hover your cursor at the top to reveal the instructions page.
